keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Recognizes the Straw Hat
keyEvents.description: When Luffy meets Whitebeard, the Yonko immediately recognizes the straw hat as the one that once belonged to Shanks, triggering a flashback to Shanks' words about betting on the New Age.
keyEvents.significance: The straw hat serves as a powerful symbol connecting Luffy to Shanks and the inherited will of the previous generation.

description: A treasured straw hat that was given to Luffy by Shanks, who in turn received it from Gol D. Roger. The hat represents Luffy's promise to Shanks to become a great pirate and return the hat when he achieves his dream.
significance: The straw hat is one of the most iconic symbols in One Piece, representing inherited will, dreams, and the passing of the torch from one generation to the next.
